explanation: The objects involved in completing the task of chilling a cut lettuce slice and a slice of lettuce in the refrigerator and placing them in the sink are: Bowl (to hold the lettuce and lettuce slices), Knife (to slice the lettuce), PepperShaker (possibly for seasoning), Lettuce (to be chilled and sliced), Plate (to place the chilled lettuce slice before placing it in the sink).
